results.title: Association of Diabetes with Oral Cancer- an Enigmatic Correlation
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ use among @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ participants was associated with a decreased risk of @DISEASE_Mouth_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009062 @@@oral cancer@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Teeth_Odd_Shapes_Of</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566076 @@@OR@@@: 0.51 and 95% C.I: 0.33 - 0.77).

citations.NLM: Mekala MR, Bangi BB, N J, Lebaka RR, Nadendla LK, Ginjupally U. Association of Diabetes with Oral Cancer- an Enigmatic Correlation Asian Pac J Cancer Prev. 2020 Mar 1;21(3):809-814. PMID: 32212811
